attributes.action: Not to move the Labour Party away from the centre-left to the left under his new leadership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, the Rt Hon Gordon Brown MP, to keep the Labour Party which is the UK's democratic Socialist party, in the centre-left ground and not to move the party's political philosophy and ideology to the far left as was "Old Labour".
